  • Method Details

    • getTags

      @Input @Optional public abstract MapProperty<String,Object> getTags()
      A key-value map of tags to inject into the project either by way of token substitution (hacky, deprecated) or generating a small Java file with the tag values.

    • getOutputClassName

      @Input @Optional public abstract Property<String> getOutputClassName()
      Class package and name (e.g. org.mymod.Tags) to fill with the provided tags.

    • getOutputDir

      @OutputDirectory public abstract DirectoryProperty getOutputDir()

    • getCleanOutputDir

      Whether to remove stale files from the output directory. True by default.
